member.name: T:RemoteViewing.Windows.Forms.VncBitmap
member.summary: Helps with Windows Forms bitmap conversion.

member.name: M:RemoteViewing.Windows.Forms.VncBitmap.CopyToFramebuffer(System.Drawing.Bitmap,RemoteViewing.Vnc.VncRectangle,RemoteViewing.Vnc.VncFramebuffer,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies a region of a bitmap into the framebuffer.
member.param: The leftmost X coordinate of the framebuffer to draw to.
The topmost Y coordinate of the framebuffer to draw to.

member.name: M:RemoteViewing.Windows.Forms.VncBitmap.CopyFromFramebuffer(RemoteViewing.Vnc.VncFramebuffer,RemoteViewing.Vnc.VncRectangle,System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies a region of the framebuffer into a bitmap.
member.param: The leftmost X coordinate of the bitmap to draw to.
The topmost Y coordinate of the bitmap to draw to.
